content: this free pattern is available exclusively at leahmichelledesigns com 1 choose a tonal or variegated yarn and let the colour shine in this easy stockinette cowl with ribbed edges it uses only one skein or about 200 yards 183 m of worsted weight yarn and is worked in the round only knit and purl stitches are used a great beginner project or an easy evening of tv knitting it is shown here in madelintosh tosh vintage the colour is sugar plum find these other free patterns at leahmichelledesigns com dappled shawl 2 blended shawl 3 truly triangular scarf 4 totally triangular scarf 5 jagged triangular scarf 6 effortless slouch hat 7 bulky ribbed cowl 8 join the leah michelle designs ravelry group 9 for pattern support announcements promos and kals subscribe to the leah michelle designs newsletter 10 for pattern announcements and subscriber-only discounts 1 leahmichelledesigns com 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dappled-shawl-3 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/blended-shawl 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/truly-triangular-scarf 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/totally-triangular-scarf 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/jagged-triangular-scarf 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/effortless-slouch 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bulky-ribbed-cowl-5 9 http //www ravelry com/groups/leah-michelle-designs 10 https //us3 list-manage com/subscribe u=e32de1565695fb08e29aa80f0&id=6d8f779113
